titleStmt.title: The answer of the House of Commons to the citisens of Londons petition for peace: wherein they declare their resolution concerning the same : likewise their propositions to the knights gentry, and trayned bands of the county of Essex, concerning the proceedings in this city, and the affairs of the whole kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: "Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that these particulars be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsyng Cler. Parl. D. Com."
Imperfect: heavily stained, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
